PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:		UAE – Abu Dhabi
QUALIFICATIONS
Korean Language Sogang University Seoul, South Korea - Sep 2019 – Dec 2019

GPA Over 70%

Arabic – fluent
French – fluent
English – excellent
Korean – Advanced
CAREER SUMMARY
March 2020 to date Samsung Engineering
Position: HR Business Partner (MEAN Region)
Leading entire scope of the implementation strategy of Emiratization in accordance with the organizations' overall goals and objectives.
Coordinate with head of departments and leaders for National Development Program of UAE national within offices and project sites including training program.
Network with relevant Government Authorities and be aware of Government regulations
Reviewing and updating HR policy in accordance with new regulation and ensure the best practice of the policy at office and in project sites.
Proposing and take HR initiatives in line with business objectives at different project sites in MENA region with action plan & timeline (recruitment, talent acquisition management, GPMS
Optimizing HR design to increase productivity and improve performance of team members
Providing support to HR / Site Admin through partnership with managers and part leaders
Cooperate closely with HR /Site admin to meet their goals & initiatives
Guide and communicate overall company HR strategy at project sites in MENA region
Collaborate with HR, Admin site to consult on HR issues and initiatives
Developing HR initiatives & operational strategy that effect performance improve at project sites in MENA region.
Suggest initiatives to develop the functioning of HR / Site Admin at different project sites.
Implementation of HR operational management strategy (UAE, SAUDI, OMAN, and ALGERIA)
Providing or suggesting team performance improve that support growth and chance in line with company objectives
Work with HR Teams in MENA region to develop HR operational strategy in line with Business Strategy
Improve HR analysis and metrics or Dashboard
Managing implementation & development of HR information systems (AI Smart ATS Solution, HR operational & Management system)
Helping company to be future ready by focusing on latest technology (Artificial intelligence, ERP)
Provide guidance on the creation and implementation of HR processes align with existing systems and solutions at project sites
Collaborating with HR team members at different project sites on implementation innovative & inclusive HR operational strategies
Improve workplace relationships, and boost productivity and retention in HR department
April 2017 to May 2018 General Electric Power
Position: HR Manager (Algeria, Egypt & South Africa)
HR Management
Recruiting & Staffing
Organizational planning for other departments
Staff motivation & Control
Employee onboarding, needed assessment and training,
Employment & compliance to regularity concerns regarding employees
Coordination with public authorities,
Health, Safety & Insurance of manpower
Personal ongoing development,
Payroll, compensation, and benefit
HR Development
Develop solutions, programs, procedures, guidelines, to help and assist the employees with the strategic goals of company
Continuous study of all Human Resources policies, programs, and their application on the field
Leads the development of each department goals, objectives
Human Resources information systems (data)
Data management on company’s website, HR section, information
Using OneHR, OHR, IDM , PM systems to speed-up tasks, empower employees, meet the other needs of the organization
March 2012 to April 2017 DAEWOO E&C (Headquarter)
May 2013 to April 2017
Position: Assistant Manager – Global HR Management Team
Foreign staff’s management in Headquarter
Overseeing hiring process, which includes coordinating job posts, reviewing resumes, and performing reference checks
Job posting & arrangement of interview schedule, proceeding recruitment applicants of job duties, responsibilities, benefits, schedules, working conditions, promotion opportunities, etc.
Updating foreign staffs’ records and insure onboarding, life cycle

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
